title: Country Life - Melantrichova
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Czech
description: Casual veggie food restaurant behind the Country Life health food shop, alley off Old Square, just south of Astronomical Clock. Restaurant is buffet style and offers fast food items including greens, salads, juices, hot main dishes, veggie burgers, and desserts. Choose what you want and pay for food by weight. Large space inside with many natural wooden tables for seating, or sit outside in the courtyard. July 2013 reported vegetarian.
